snippet: The agreement in principle, reached two days before the start of the league’s 20th season, prevented the first work stoppage in M.L.S. history.
abstract: Major League Soccer agrees to five-year collective bargaining agreement with its players union just two days before start of league's 20th season.
lead_paragraph: The agreement in principle, reached two days before the start of the league’s 20th season, prevented the first work stoppage in M.L.S. history.

headline.main: M.L.S. and Union Reach Deal Giving Free Agency to Veterans
headline.print_headline: M.L.S. and Union Reach Deal Giving Free Agency to Veterans
